segments.advisor_message: Okay, so let’s talk about your income sources. Can you tell me, like, what’s your primary source, ya know, the main income you get? Like is it salary, or maybe rental income or something else?
segments.client_message: Uh, yeah, I mean, I guess, it’s my salary, right? I work at this tech place, um, around 4,000 I think, and, um, it's monthly. Yeah, every, uh, month I get that, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Got it, 4,000 monthly is solid. And just to confirm, is that net or gross, if you don’t mind me askin’?
segments.client_message: Oh, right! That’s gross, yeah, before, uh, taxes and stuff. And so, I just wanna make sure I have this all clear, um, no specific, uh, timeframe just, you know, for now I guess?
